Just had to comment after I saw dude said it doesn't work.  It works perfectly you don't even have to crack this.  It's running beautifully even on my Radeon HD 7770 on ultra settings.  Game is gorgeous and haven't had a problem yet at around now 3-4 hours gameplay.

Yes you can save the game and I think it might be survival edition because when you first start the game you have to click ok for around 20 fking notifications about unlocked content.  Another beautiful release from Black Box!  Great game I will probably buy for multiplayer.

It works for me, but it does something very strange every now and then usually before a cutscene. My screen flickers a bunch of jibberish for about 5-10 seconds and then it gos away. It's hard to explain but that's the jist of it.. Other than that, the game runs fine. I recommend not using tressfx though. I5 3570 @ 4.2 Ghz and Nvidia gtx 660 ti.

Great torrent, Gh0stNet! The game runs great most of the time, but every now and then there is a small bug, such as part of the menu staying on the screen for a few seconds after closing it but I've only encountered that twice in two hours of game play. Also, I can't play the game for more than 30 minutes to an hour at a time because the game freezes up and shuts down, which isn't a HUGE problem because I can just restart from the checkpoint.
